subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova narrowly avoided a stunning third-set collapse, overcoming the soaring heat and her own mistakes to defeat Camille Pin, 6-3, 4-6, 9-7, in the first round of the Australian Open on Tuesday.
snippet: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova narrowly avoided a stunning third-set collapse, overcoming the soaring heat and her own mistakes to defeat Camille Pin, 6-3, 4-6, 9-7, in the first round of the Australian Open on Tuesday.
